attributes.action: Cancel the Dartford Crossing toll charges for local people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In November 1963 when the first bridge opened we were told the toll charges would stop, when it was paid for.  Now 2007 we want the toll charges stopped, for local people as we have the added traffic, congestion at peak times, noise and fumes to live with for ever.  We deserve a little compensation.
